author: rlubke
msg: - Applied patch to correct content length expected by tests (Supplied by Remy Maucherat (remm at apache.org)).
- Applied patch to jsp-gtest.xml remove extra space between request path and HTTP version (Supplied by Remy Maucherat (remm at apache.org)
- Commented out negativeCloseTest in jsp-gtest.xml.  Test is invalid and needs to be reworked.

author: rlubke
msg: GTest now uses Socket.getLocalAddress() to determine client hostname and IP.

author: rlubke
msg: - Added additional logic to the GetRemoteHost tests so that if an IP address of 127.0.0.1 was sent from the
client as a check, that a value of localhost returned from the server would be valid.
SetContentLength test didn't take into account the LF added by println().
ServletResponseWrapperSetContentLenghTest didn't take the length of the data introduced by the wrapper
All tests pass(?) running against the Old HTTP connector and Coyote.

author: rlubke
msg: - Added an overlooked check in location header check.
(doesn't pay to get out of bed some days)
